mission.title: Our Story & Mission
content: Solviotech was founded by Joseph Kennedy (JK) and Philip Osir â€” two passionate full-stack software engineers driven by the vision of providing elegant, scalable, and intelligent technology solutions for businesses around the world.

We specialize in full-stack web and mobile development, cloud integration, and UI/UX design. Our mission is to create meaningful digital experiences that simplify complex problems and accelerate business growth.

team.sectionTitle: The passionate individuals behind Solviotech's success

members.name: Joseph Kennedy (JK)
members.bio: Passionate full-stack developer with expertise in React, Python, and cloud technologies. JK specializes in creating scalable web applications and has a keen eye for both frontend aesthetics and backend architecture.

members.name: Philip Osir
members.bio: Skilled full-stack engineer and UI/UX designer who bridges design and functionality. Osir crafts seamless, high-performance web experiences with strong attention to user interaction, scalability, and modern architecture.
